title: First Aid Supplies Quiz
description: How well do you know first aid kit essentials? Test your knowledge of bandages, medications, and emergency supplies.

questions.question: Which first aid item is a stretchy fabric wrap used to hold dressings in place or support injured joints?
What is an adhesive bandage (Band-Aid) primarily used for?
options: Covering and protecting small cuts, scrapes, and blisters

questions.question: Which over-the-counter medication is commonly used to reduce fever and relieve pain, found in most first aid kits?
What is a triangular bandage used for in first aid?
options: Creating an arm sling, bandaging wounds, or as a tourniquet

questions.question: Which antiseptic solution is commonly used to clean wounds and prevent infection?
What is an instant cold pack used for?
options: Reducing swelling and pain from sprains and bruises

questions.question: Which first aid supply is a thin strip used to close small wounds by pulling the edges together?
What is an EpiPen (epinephrine auto-injector) used for?
options: Emergency treatment of severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis)

questions.question: Which item in a first aid kit is used to remove splinters, ticks, or small debris from wounds?
What is antibiotic ointment (like Neosporin) used for?
options: Applying to minor cuts and scrapes to prevent bacterial infection

questions.question: Which device is used to restrict blood flow to a limb in cases of life-threatening bleeding?
What is a CPR face shield or pocket mask used for?
options: Providing a barrier during rescue breathing to protect the rescuer

questions.question: Which first aid item is a rigid or semi-rigid device used to immobilize a broken bone?
What is calamine lotion commonly used to treat?
options: Itching from poison ivy, insect bites, and minor skin irritations

questions.question: Which item is a sterile eye wash solution used to flush irritants from the eyes?
